additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Each chewable tablet contains: Sambucus nigra (Black Elderberry) fruit juice dry 46.57mg Equiv. to Sambucus nigra fruit juice fresh 1.63g Echinacea purpurea (Echinacea) herb juice dry 27.11mg Equiv. to Echinacea purpurea herb fresh 1.22g Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 25mg Zinc (as Zinc citrate dihydrate) 3mg Citrus bioflavonoids extract 5mg Contains sugars, sulfites and sucralose.

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Contains sugars, sulfites and sucralose. Contains zinc which may be dangerous if taken in large amounts or for a long period. 24 chewable tablets

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Not to be used in children under 2 years of age without medical advice. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Contains sugars, sulfites and sucralose. Contains zinc which may be dangerous if taken in large amounts or for a long period. This product is only to be used under adult supervision.

description: Ease A Cold Kids Cold And Flu Chewable Tablets
name: Kids Cold And Flu Chewable Tablets
